name: jcab

comment: Distributive law for implication over conjunction. Compare Theorem *4.76 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 121. (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 27-Nov-2013.)
